Hi, I'm Gabriele Pappalardo (a.k.a. @gabryon or @gabryon99)! I'm 21 years old. I'm a Computer Science Student at University of Pisa and a UI developer and UX Designer at ntop.
On this personal blog, I'm going to note things that I like (pretty much Computer Science stuff) and I'll use it as a little portfolio for the people who don't know me. I would like to become a Game Developer since videogames are my passion.

Feel free to see my Github page.
